name: Stream Chaining Test Workflow
description: Test workflow to verify stream chaining is working

tasks.name: Generate Initial Data
tasks.claudePrompt: Generate a list of 3 random numbers between 1 and 100. Output them as a simple JSON array like [42, 67, 89]. Be concise.

tasks.name: Process Numbers
tasks.claudePrompt: You are receiving numbers from the previous agent via stream-json. Double each number and output the results as a JSON array. Only output the array, nothing else.

tasks.name: Summarize Results
tasks.claudePrompt: You are receiving doubled numbers from the previous agent via stream-json. Calculate their sum and output: 'The sum of the doubled numbers is: X'
